sentences.english: In a clear stream lies an untouched bright pearl.
sentences.chinese: 一顆純潔璀璨的明珠就臥在清澈溪底。

sentences.english: Yesterday many a brilliant star of culture shone over Hangzhou;
sentences.chinese: 昨天的杭州，文化星空羣星璀璨。

sentences.english: I want to be a bright, bright star.
sentences.chinese: 我想變成一顆明亮璀璨的星星。

sentences.english: So dazzlingly radiant, it must be treasure rare.
sentences.chinese: 定是珍奇異寶，如此奪目璀璨。

sentences.english: Education, soul, needs the sun, the children will be warm and bright.
sentences.chinese: 教育的靈魂，需要陽光，孩子便會溫暖璀璨。

sentences.english: The sky was full of stars dancing and twinkling.
sentences.chinese: 夜空繁星點點，璀璨閃爍。

sentences.english: After the dazzling fireworks flower briefly as the broad-leaved epiphyllum, after the passion of vanity.
sentences.chinese: 煙火璀璨過後的曇花一現，激情過後的空虛失落。

sentences.english: You needn’t have a clear view of the sky toexperience the starry night.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要看清天空，就享有一個星空璀璨的夜晚。

sentences.english: You have had by any standards a spectacular career.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，您的教學生涯非常璀璨。

sentences.english: Hong Kong is forever a shinning pearl of our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 香港永遠是祖國的一顆璀璨明珠。

sentences.english: Light a man sit on the swing swing, Moonlight, Star bright.
sentences.chinese: 一個人坐在鞦韆上輕蕩，月夜下，星光璀璨。

sentences.english: Wonderful and graceful song is melodious, the bright lights are always splendid.
sentences.chinese: 妙曼的歌聲總是悠揚，璀璨的燈火總是絢爛。

sentences.english: Saturday morning came, and all the summer world was bright and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜六的早晨來了，整個夏日世界，一片璀璨鮮豔。

sentences.english: His huge, light shape devoured the black ill.
sentences.chinese: 他龐然璀璨的身形吞噬着黑幽幽的山丘。

sentences.english: But there is a lot of artistry in the best of the West.
sentences.chinese: 但是別忘了在西方文化裏還有許多璀璨的藝術。

sentences.english: I look forward to watching her career continue to flourish in the years to come," Werde said.
sentences.chinese: 我非常期待她的職業生涯在未來幾年更加璀璨。

definition: lit. flowing light and overflowing color/brilliant lights and vibrant colors (idiom)
bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
